title: Video: When to choose iPads vs. Chromebooks
text:
12 Video: When to choose iPads vs. Chromebooks 
eSchool News: In the last few years iPads and Chromebooks have both seen astronomical growth in education becoming two of the most popular devices for classrooms and one-to-one programs. In light of that itâ€™s only natural that power users and fans will compare and contrast their merits, given that so many schools have limited funds for devices.
